medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began approximately 10 days ago and has been progressively worsening. It started vague and described as burning and cramping, becoming severe over the last day. It radiates to the right lower quadrant (RLQ) and epigastrium. There was an episode of loose stool this morning. No exacerbating or relieving factors have been noted.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Dyslipidemia, Hypertension, Coronary artery disease (presumptive), Pulmonary nodules under CT follow-up, Squamous cell skin cancer, Basal cell carcinoma, Melanoma of trunk, Obstructive Sleep Apnea complicated by Pulmonary hypertension and right-sided heart failure, Asthma, Diastolic heart failure, Osteoarthritis, Gout, Atrial Fibrillation on warfarin, Morbid obesity, Peripheral Vascular disease, Venous insufficiency, Anemia, Thrombocytopenia, Chronic Kidney Disease, Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia, Depression, Anxiety, Zenker's Diverticulum, Sensorineural Hearing Loss, Hydrocele (bilateral), Varicocele, History of squamous cell carcinoma (R thumb, L arm), History of basal cell cancer (multiple sites), Total Knee Replacement.
medical_history.family_history: Father died of lung cancer, siblings (brother and sister) died of lung cancer, sister had cancer and a heart disorder, son currently being treated for cancer.
